trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.BeforeAddDataBoundRow> event occurs before a new row is added to a data source that is bound to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.BeforeAddDataBoundRow>事件发生在新行添加到绑定到数据源之前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>, and binds the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>，并将绑定<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>到<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: It then creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.BeforeAddDataBoundRow> event handler that cancels the addition of the new row.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject.BeforeAddDataBoundRow>取消添加新行的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: To test the event, manually add a new row to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject> on sheet 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试事件，手动向其中添加新行<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ListObject>表 1 上。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the addition of a new row should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应取消该添加新行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row should not be added to the data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果不应将行添加到数据;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row to be added to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取要添加到数据源的行。

trans-unit.source: Use this argument to get the data that the user entered so that you can provide any additional information or modify the data.
trans-unit.target: 使用此参数来获取用户输入，以便你可以提供任何其他信息或修改数据的数据。

trans-unit.source: If the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, then the item is a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> object, not a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源是<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，则该项为<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>对象，而不<xref:System.Data.DataRow>对象。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。
